title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: November 25, 2022, 09:51:55 PMLast edit: December 01, 2022, 01:48:18 AM by MoparMiningLLC
content: I still have quite a few of the error chips (wrong colors) from my 5 chip sets (only 3 sets remaining) and with the holidays upon us, I have decided to do a giveaway of 20 of these 2 chip sets.I will do 100 slots and once full, I will select a starting block number - the last 2 digits of that blocks hash will determine the winner. winners may only win once - so this could take a few extra blocks if a number comes up multiple times. example: 00000000000000000000e8bb9ba9ab1e944feec4f359251c6ba8603bb6b6a9fa ¬†69 would be the winnerwinners will receive:1 poker chip black/purple denominated in .0075 BTC 1 poker chip white/yellow denominated in .0025 BTC2 random serialized holograms as this is a free giveaway, shipping will be either combined with current/future orders or given to minerjones for consolidation.details and images of the chips can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403370.0rules:1. one number per person2. no newbies3. no alt accounts

comments.body: 26- MojoThank you for the giveaway Mopar!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: 55 - kryptowerkMuch apprechiated. 20 sets - that's an amazing giveaway.I quickly checked your OP and didn't find any info on it: These chips have a denomination printed on them - was/is there any way to buy them funded?Thanks!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on November 25, 2022, 10:22:30 PM55 - kryptowerkMuch apprechiated. 20 sets - that's an amazing giveaway.I quickly checked your OP and didn't find any info on it: These chips have a denomination printed on them - was/is there any way to buy them funded?Thanks!the thread I linked in OP has the details on the error chips and has a link to the original set of 5 chips.if you are a winner and would like to have them assembled and funded, I can assist with that.if you are not a winner and still would like a set, I have plenty more

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: Thank you for this very generous giveaway @MoparMiningLLC20 sets is an amazing giveaway.  I wish you Happy Holidays!So i want to try my luck to get one of these Sets with my lucky Number#63 - -doubleU-Thank you and good luck to all other participants.
